title: Signs of the Times
content:
I'm totally pandering, but felt this was quite pertinent to us, typographers.

The downward spiral of America, Graphically, at least. Please Digg, if you're a member.

[http://digg.com/arts\_culture/Why\_America\_Is\_Fuckedh\_Graphically\_At\_Least...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730130747/http:/digg.com/arts_culture/Why_America_Is_Fuckedh_Graphically_At_Least?OTC-em-st1 "http://digg.com/arts\_culture/Why\_America\_Is\_Fuckedh\_Graphically\_At\_Least?OTC-em-st1")
